name: Zombie Stick Hero
description:
Old friend Stick Hero became zombies!
Build a bridge to help the sweet zombie as far as possible to get out of the cemetery. But be carefully - if the bridge is too long or too short - zombies will die again. And again. And again ... and again.
How far can you run?
Collect flying brains and buy yourself new things, help to pass on and on!
Tucked in his new jet pack and fly brains go!

Features:
- Forget about the cherry! Here you have to jump and catch the brains!
- Jetpack able to take you through a complex obstacle!
- Put on the helmet of zombies - please keep it down!
- Share your results with your friends in social networks!
